name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. William PIERCE, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. William PIERCE, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of February, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED. Counsel’s request for leave to withdraw is granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. William PIERCE, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 18, 2009.
